As the follow-up riding on "Housewives'" coattails, I was ready to dismiss it outright as "Ally McBeal in hospital scrubs." But not having much else to watch in that time slot, I decided to give it a try, and was I pleasantly shocked! Though there ARE some moments where the principal characters come off as self-centered, neurotic and at times downright eccentric, it never reached the level of absurdity that "Ally" often did, and thank God for that! Ellen Pompeo as Dr. Meredith Grey comes off as likable and probably more self-aware and introspective than self-absorbed and scatterbrained, though there are moments you do want to reach into the screen and give her a good shaking.

And good call on the ensemble casting! You really have to give props to any show that FINALLY figures out how to effectively showcase the sweet-and-sour charms of Sandra Oh, who was good enough to elevate a sow's ear of a show like "Arli$$," if not to save it. And not to mention give assorted actors who have all been great in projects not up to their talents, the chance to really shine in some very well-written roles, and I want to single out Katherine Heigl, Justin Chambers, Chandra Wilson and especially T.R. Knight as George, who is really coming into his own as this season progresses.

Not to snub Isaiah Washington, James Pickens, Jr., Kate Walsh or the so-hot-it's-criminal Patrick Dempsey. Seasoned vets all, it's just good to see them all land in a nice place where they can do great work with some sense of job security. (WE HOPE.) 

Realistic enough to be accessible but not a turn-off, and whimsically light enough at other times without straying into "Stefan-the-Frog" territory, (are you listening, David Kelley?), "Grey's" should remain as a dependable Sunday night staple as long as creator/producer Shonda Rhimes and her crew are able to continue to strike that balance, and keep its newfound audience interested and entertained with the trials, tribulations and trysts of the staff at Seattle Grace Hospital.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":279270,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dobro mjesto
programme.desc: Nakon smrti ima života. Hoćete li biti poslani na "dobro" ili "loše mjesto"? Pa… lokacija vašeg zagrobnog života ovisi o tome kako ste se ponijeli za zemaljskog života. Zbog pogreške, Eleanor Shellstrop je nakon smrti poslana na Dobro mjesto, kamo uopće ne pripada. Dok se skriva od Michaela, mudrog arhitekta Dobrog mjesta koji ne zna da je pogriješio, odlučuje odbaciti svoj stari način života i postati bolja.

programme.title: The Ledge
Na obodu
programme.desc:
The Ledge: Directed by Matthew Chapman. With Charlie Hunnam, Terrence Howard, Liv Tyler, Patrick Wilson. A police officer looks to talk down a young man lured by his lover's husband to the ledge of a high rise, where he has one hour to contemplate a fateful decision." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1535970/","name":"The Ledge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0MjUwNDM0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTc1MTYxNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police officer looks to talk down a young man lured by his lover's husband to the ledge of a high rise, where he has one hour to contemplate a fateful decision.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1535970/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"johnnymonsarrat"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stunning, intelligent thriller about the dangers of heart vs. head!","reviewBody":"It's not hard to put together a monster film. You throw one insane guy together with a hero, and add a car chase. The Ledge is nothing like this, and that's why it's so impressive.

The main struggle is between a Christian with extreme beliefs, and an Atheist who just wants out. Uniquely, it's the only film I can think of that has an openly atheist hero and an A-list cast. And ironically, the few people who have complained about this show exactly what the film is trying to portray: that some people are so intolerant of atheism that even one movie among the thousands in history is too much for them.

To me, the star of this film is Patrick Wilson, who plays the fundamentalist. Instead of becoming a monster, his portrayal links completely normal passions like love and protection and revenge that we can all identify with, but then takes it to the natural conclusion, egged on by his convictions that anything he decides to do must be blessed.

Thus the central thesis of the film -- that belief can go too far -- is played out on a small stage. This is a drama of just 6 people, but the intricate explosions between them pull at the heartstrings far more effectively than a car chase in an action film would. We hear so much about the dangers of religion in big stories like 9-11, gay rights, and abortion rights. Here is a film about the dangerous of religion in the everyday, the dramas so commonplace that everyone who watches can find something in their own lives to compare it with.

Sure, I've never walked out onto The Ledge. But something about the masterful writing and acting in this film creates an authenticity that is undeniable.

Go ahead. Rant against atheism. Show us how intolerant you are. Violent words and deeds are the response of someone backed into a corner, desperate not to lose it all, just like "Joe" is in this film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19240,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-05-26","keywords":"suicide,nonlinear timeline,death of daughter,african american,infidelity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Ledge","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2065669401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQyMjk4NDY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM5MTYxNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQyMjk4NDY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM5MTYxNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A thriller in which a battle of philosophies between a fundamentalist Christian and an atheist escalates into a lethal battle of wills"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0402271/","name":"Charlie Hunnam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005024/","name":"Terrence Howard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152466/","name":"Matthew Chapman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139768/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0366425/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0160601/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152466/","name":"Matthew Chapman"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Curious George
Znatiželjni George
programme.desc:
Curious George: Directed by Matthew O'Callaghan. With Frank Welker, Will Ferrell, Shane Baumel, Timyra-Joi Beatty. The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0381971/","name":"Curious George","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODIxNzYxNDEzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjA1NTM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0381971/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"richa333"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Fun for everyone with a young heart!","reviewBody":"From the very first moment that Curious George scampers onto the screen to begin his funny adventures, my heart was swept away with laughter. All my cares disappeared while my wife and I giggled with all the other kids, very young and very old, watching George do his best to do the right thing  only to get in more and more trouble from the adult animals all around. Soon George (a 'monkey'  actually a chimpanzee) finds better times with the animal children, whom he gathers around a chameleon that they light up like a rainbow disco strobe.

Sounds silly? It sure is, and more fun than an elephant with a smiley face painted by George on its butt! (Everyone screamed with laughter at that one.) Within less time than it takes George to settle down for the night, all alone, we're not watching a movie  we're living the adventure with him. For those who have read the Curious George books, you know (or soon remember) how the story goes. For those adults or kids who haven't read the books yet, let the story sweep you away.

For those interested in such curious things: this movie is animated, hand-drawn in vibrant primary colors with fun background music by Jack Johnson. It's faithful to the spirit and drawings of Margret and H.A. Rey who created the Curious George books. If you have any youth in your heart, you will be delightfully swept away by the good ship H.A. Rey into the antic-filled, lovely and gentle world of Curious George and his new family.

I had a gentle, fun good time seeing this movie with my wife (a grandma). So did the preview theater, full not only with kids of all ages with their parents & grandparents, but a couple in their 20's on a date! IMDb data; ttnr: 0381971, Title: Curious George, --- Description: Curious George: Directed by Matthew O'Callaghan. With Frank Welker, Will Ferrell, Shane Baumel, Timyra-Joi Beatty. The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0381971/","name":"Curious George","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODIxNzYxNDEzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjA1NTM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0381971/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"richa333","dateCreated":"2006-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Fun for everyone with a young heart!","reviewBody":"From the very first moment that Curious George scampers onto the screen to begin his funny adventures, my heart was swept away with laughter. All my cares disappeared while my wife and I giggled with all the other kids, very young and very old, watching George do his best to do the right thing  only to get in more and more trouble from the adult animals all around. Soon George (a 'monkey'  actually a chimpanzee) finds better times with the animal children, whom he gathers around a chameleon that they light up like a rainbow disco strobe.

Sounds silly? It sure is, and more fun than an elephant with a smiley face painted by George on its butt! (Everyone screamed with laughter at that one.) Within less time than it takes George to settle down for the night, all alone, we're not watching a movie  we're living the adventure with him. For those who have read the Curious George books, you know (or soon remember) how the story goes. For those adults or kids who haven't read the books yet, let the story sweep you away.

For those interested in such curious things: this movie is animated, hand-drawn in vibrant primary colors with fun background music by Jack Johnson. It's faithful to the spirit and drawings of Margret and H.A. Rey who created the Curious George books. If you have any youth in your heart, you will be delightfully swept away by the good ship H.A. Rey into the antic-filled, lovely and gentle world of Curious George and his new family.

I had a gentle, fun good time seeing this movie with my wife (a grandma). So did the preview theater, full not only with kids of all ages with their parents & grandparents, but a couple in their 20's on a date! This is a really gentle, really good movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-02-10","keywords":"cell phone photograph,animal character name as title,curious george the monkey character,no opening credits,part computer animation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506405/","name":"Eugene Levy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639965/","name":"Matthew O'Callaghan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0682784/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442190/","name":"Ken Kaufman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108273/","name":"Mike Werb","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597712/","name":"Margret Rey"],"duration":"PT1H27M"</script><metacontent="

The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0089670/","name":"National Lampoon's European Vacation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJhZTBlZDQtZGFjNC00OTU1LWFmNDMtZmQ5YzllYzk2NGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0089670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"allyatherton"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun movie to see in the New Year.","reviewBody":"What happens when a moron takes a road trip around Europe.

Starring Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Dana Hill and Jason Lively.

Written by John Hughes and Robert Klane,

Directed by Amy Heckerling.

I chose this oldie to watch on New Year's Eve with my family.

It's a fun movie and kept us entertained while we waited for Big Ben to chime in the new year. We all had a good chuckle and I think we all enjoyed it. I don't know what was funnier, the script or the eighties clothes!

A fun way to see in the New Year,

Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2381249/","name":"Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTFmNDA3ZjMtN2Y0MC00NDYyLWFlY2UtNTQ4OTQxMmY1NmVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTg4NDQ4NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2381249/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lucasespindola-91322"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Greatness, once again","reviewBody":"The first scene perfectly captures the movie: fast and jaw-dropping. It is an action packed movie, and it is goddamn good. It shows how rare a franchise like MI is, being the fourth great movie (and third in a row) in the series. Cruise's chemistry with everyone is as fluid as ever and the team feels more mature and, at the same time, more interesting. Solomon Lane is a great antagonist and there is no denying Sean Harris gets a well deserved second best villain in the franchise, only after legendary Philip Seymour Hoffman. It is a great movie, executed brilliantly and it deserves the praise it gets.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":356752,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-12","keywords":"spy,rogue agent,computer hacker,mission,capture","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3396513817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg4OTM2NDU3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQwNTUwNjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg4OTM2NDU3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQwNTUwNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272581/","name":"Rebecca Ferguson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021593/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312367/","name":"Bruce Geller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1510800/","name":"Drew Pearce"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
Lopovi, ubojice i dvije nabijene puške
programme.desc:
Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham. Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120735/","name":"Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAyN2JmZmEtNjAyMy00NzYwLThmY2MtYWQ3OGNhNjExMmM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120735/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"doktor d"},"dateCreated":"2003-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"The essence of late 90's cinema -- hip, highly stylized, VISUAL","reviewBody":"Guy Ritchie's hip, highly stylized 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels' is a truly remarkable film, not only for its appropriately pyrotechnic camera work, but also for its seemingly flawless, puzzle-perfect script/screenplay. While the picture's main focus is on a group of lads who invest money in a high-stakes, rigged card game and lose, the broader story concerns approximately eight different groups of criminals whose paths cross (more> than once, in some cases) during various illegal pursuits: money, guns, drugs, even revenge. The film is quite violent, both on and off screen, but it's also uniformly humorous throughout. It's important to note that the four central characters (a cook, a card sharp, and a couple of guys who sell "discounted" items) are interested only in acquiring the money to pay off their enormous debt; they kill no one. The same applies to the laid-back college boys who "grow copious amounts of ganja".

 The cast is comprised of mostly young, veteran, male actors. In fact, the only female in the film doesn't even speak, though she handles a machine gun fairly well. Sting appears briefly in several scenes as a bar-owning father figure. While his secondary performance is solid, as usual, it is also unmemorable. The soundtrack is first-rate, from the 60's hits of James Brown to the contemporary beats of London's underground. The groovy, pulsating music and lyrics are often succinctly synchronized with the action and dialogue in the film, creating a theatrical rhythm that is fairly uncommon in cinema (from any period).

 Critics and audiences over the years have often dismissed stylized camera work as pretentious and unnecessary, stating that it detracts from the story, bogs it down, or pads it; however, the film medium has the luxury of actually "displaying" a story for its audience, unlike the written word alone. It's what the medium is all about -- it's VISUAL. Hence, one of the reasons a filmmaker chooses such visual displays is to "brand" his or her work, in the same way as writers like Cummings, Hemingway or Joyce did with their medium. It's hard to imagine a cinema without Hitchcock, Kubrick, or Scorsese to represent it. To this end, Ritchie has taken his first step in establishing his own brand. His energetic, ultra-contemporary camera work incorporates (through a fresh perspective) such devices as slow motion, fast motion, and freeze-frame coupled with narration. It is at times reminiscent of (and actually expands upon) Martin Scorsese's patented visual stylistics and camera movements, like those found in 'Mean Streets' and 'Goodfellas'. But the similarities with Scorsese's work end there.

 Critics' endless comparisons of Ritchie's film with the works of Quentin Tarantino and Danny Boyle's 'Trainspotting' stand mostly unwarranted, as these comparisons take away from the inventiveness and originality of 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels'. Ritchie's film is a much more involved, complex, layered work than the aforementioned comparisons. While Tarantino's films are very strong on dialogue, screenplay, and editing, they often lack creative camera work and direction. Boyle's 'Trainspotting' does have a resembling "feel" to 'LS&TSB', but aside from its Great Britain origins, there really is no need for comparison. 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels' is essential viewing."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":558819,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1998-08-28","keywords":"gangster,dark comedy,violence,united kingdom,shotgun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lock, Stock, And Two Smoking Barrels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2274558233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTYyMzdmNTUtMmMxMS00NTFmLWFjNzItMzAxNDVlZThkZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTYyMzdmNTUtMmMxMS00NTFmLWFjNzItMzAxNDVlZThkZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from PolyGram Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002076/","name":"Jason Flemyng"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002077/","name":"Dexter Fletcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0602941/","name":"Nick Moran"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024369/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000750/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0120735, Title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels, --- Description: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham. Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120735/","name":"Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAyN2JmZmEtNjAyMy00NzYwLThmY2MtYWQ3OGNhNjExMmM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120735/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"doktor d","dateCreated":"2003-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"The essence of late 90's cinema -- hip, highly stylized, VISUAL","reviewBody":"Guy Ritchie's hip, highly stylized 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels' is a truly remarkable film, not only for its appropriately pyrotechnic camera work, but also for its seemingly flawless, puzzle-perfect script/screenplay. While the picture's main focus is on a group of lads who invest money in a high-stakes, rigged card game and lose, the broader story concerns approximately eight different groups of criminals whose paths cross (more> than once, in some cases) during various illegal pursuits: money, guns, drugs, even revenge. The film is quite violent, both on and off screen, but it's also uniformly humorous throughout. It's important to note that the four central characters (a cook, a card sharp, and a couple of guys who sell "discounted" items) are interested only in acquiring the money to pay off their enormous debt; they kill no one. The same applies to the laid-back college boys who "grow copious amounts of ganja".

 The cast is comprised of mostly young, veteran, male actors. In fact, the only female in the film doesn't even speak, though she handles a machine gun fairly well. Sting appears briefly in several scenes as a bar-owning father figure. While his secondary performance is solid, as usual, it is also unmemorable. The soundtrack is first-rate, from the 60's hits of James Brown to the contemporary beats of London's underground. The groovy, pulsating music and lyrics are often succinctly synchronized with the action and dialogue in the film, creating a theatrical rhythm that is fairly uncommon in cinema (from any period).

 Critics and audiences over the years have often dismissed stylized camera work as pretentious and unnecessary, stating that it detracts from the story, bogs it down, or pads it; however, the film medium has the luxury of actually "displaying" a story for its audience, unlike the written word alone. It's what the medium is all about -- it's VISUAL. Hence, one of the reasons a filmmaker chooses such visual displays is to "brand" his or her work, in the same way as writers like Cummings, Hemingway or Joyce did with their medium. It's hard to imagine a cinema without Hitchcock, Kubrick, or Scorsese to represent it. To this end, Ritchie has taken his first step in establishing his own brand. His energetic, ultra-contemporary camera work incorporates (through a fresh perspective) such devices as slow motion, fast motion, and freeze-frame coupled with narration. It is at times reminiscent of (and actually expands upon) Martin Scorsese's patented visual stylistics and camera movements, like those found in 'Mean Streets' and 'Goodfellas'. But the similarities with Scorsese's work end there.

 Critics' endless comparisons of Ritchie's film with the works of Quentin Tarantino and Danny Boyle's 'Trainspotting' stand mostly unwarranted, as these comparisons take away from the inventiveness and originality of 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels'. Ritchie's film is a much more involved, complex, layered work than the aforementioned comparisons. While Tarantino's films are very strong on dialogue, screenplay, and editing, they often lack creative camera work and direction. Boyle's 'Trainspotting' does have a resembling "feel" to 'LS&TSB', but aside from its Great Britain origins, there really is no need for comparison. 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels' is essential viewing.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":558819,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1998-08-28","keywords":"gangster,dark comedy,violence,united kingdom,shotgun","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lock, Stock, And Two Smoking Barrels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2274558233","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTYyMzdmNTUtMmMxMS00NTFmLWFjNzItMzAxNDVlZThkZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTYyMzdmNTUtMmMxMS00NTFmLWFjNzItMzAxNDVlZThkZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from PolyGram Video","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002076/","name":"Jason Flemyng","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002077/","name":"Dexter Fletcher","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0602941/","name":"Nick Moran"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024369/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000750/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"],"duration":"PT1H47M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: National Lampoon's Vacation
Godišnji odmor snova
programme.desc:
National Lampoon's Vacation: Directed by Harold Ramis. With Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Imogene Coca, Randy Quaid. The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0085995/","name":"National Lampoon's Vacation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmViMGQ4ZDktNzI3OC00YjVkLWJmZDgtOTI4N2FhNjhjNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0085995/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lechuguilla"},"dateCreated":"2011-02-06","inLanguage":"English","name":""I'm On A Pilgrimage To See A Moose"","reviewBody":""Getting there is half the fun", says bland family man Clark, head of the bland suburban family, the Griswolds. He's rationalizing why the family will drive from Illinois, instead of fly, to Wally World, a moose-centered family amusement park in California. What makes this film enjoyable is that the Griswolds are so typical of banal American suburban family values.

Clark (Chevy Chase) is a good-natured sap, gullibly idealistic, and conforming. His meek wife (well played by Beverly D'Angelo) looks up to Clark. Their two teenage kids are dull blockheads, patterned after their dull parents. The boy wears ugly dental braces.

Their mode of travel is a prehistoric, humorously ugly, putrid green station wagon with cheesy brown panels. The Griswolds blast off with unlimited optimism and good-natured anticipation of the fun they will have at Wally World. But the optimism gradually fades and is replaced by grim determination after a series of on-the-road disasters that make a mockery of idealism.

The film's humor lies in its absurd plot situations, and in the dialogue. At a cookout, a down-on-his-luck Cousin Eddie (Randy Quaid) treats the Griswolds to backyard burgers, then remarks to Clark: "I don't know why they call this stuff hamburger helper. It does just fine by itself".

Casting is appropriate. Overall acting trends humorously exaggerated, consistent with the satire. Performances by Imogene Coca and John Candy add to the comedy. The bouncy song "Holiday Road" opens the film with a series of vintage American postcards in tandem with the opening credits.

My only reservation is that some of the plot contrivances are a bit over-the-top. The writers seem to be trying a little too hard.

"Vacation" is a satire on the banality of the traditional American summer ritual, and therefore thematically rich. Production values are fine. Though not perfect, this film is worth watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":102848,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1983-07-29","keywords":"road movie,dysfunctional family,national lampoon series,blonde in ferrari,lust","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2924395289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUxYTc1ZDMtZDM2Yi00YjdhLTg5YTctMDVlZmU2ZjRiM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUxYTc1ZDMtZDM2Yi00YjdhLTg5YTctMDVlZmU2ZjRiM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000331/","name":"Chevy Chase"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000350/","name":"Beverly D'Angelo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0168042/","name":"Imogene Coca"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102282/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000455/","name":"John Hughes"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Birdman or
Birdman
programme.desc:
Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance): Directed by Alejandro G. Iñárritu. With Michael Keaton, Emma Stone, Kenny Chin, Jamahl Garrison-Lowe. A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2562232/","name":"Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAzNDMxMzAxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMxMjA4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2562232/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"socker1187"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining and Enthralling","reviewBody":"I saw the preview for this a few months ago and I must say that all I could think was, "This looks weird." After seeing it last night at the NY Film Festival (as the closing film of this year's festival), I came out more than pleasantly surprised. I don't know what type of film the preview was trying to make "Birdman" seem like, but it's not anything like I thought it would be.

Inarritu, the editors, and the cinematographers incorporate a style of editing which would have been impressive without any plot whatsoever. It kept me on the edge of my seat the entire time, almost to a fault. It's almost exhausting having to keep up with it all. The score by Sanchez is bare but works great for the film, and is aided by a few visual representations mixed in throughout. The cast is more than up to the challenge as well, especially Keaton and Norton who have a few scenes where they each get to flex their acting chops. The rest of the cast doesn't seem to get as much of a chance to show off, but does not make their performances any less impressive. Awards for the four mentioned by name here could be forthcoming.

An entertaining film well worth the price of admission. Don't let the strange preview fool you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":604874,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-02-25","keywords":"actor,showbiz,replacement,inner voice,former celebrity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1378069529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTk3YWMyYmEtMTRiZS00NTBjLTgzMmUtMGQyOTRjMzU4NTczXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTk3YWMyYmEtMTRiZS00NTBjLTgzMmUtMGQyOTRjMzU4NTczXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":"A washed-up actor who once played an iconic superhero must overcome his ego and family trouble as he mounts a Broadway play in a bid to reclaim his past glory.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000474/","name":"Michael Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0302108/","name":"Zach Galifianakis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0327944/","name":"Alejandro G. programme.title: Enigma
Enigma
programme.desc:
Enigma: Directed by Michael Apted. With Dougray Scott, Kate Winslet, Saffron Burrows, Jeremy Northam. A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0157583/","name":"Enigma","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTI5ODU3N2UtM2QzNS00NjM1LWExNzMtNjgzYWQ5MWNkYTJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjA0MzYwMDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0157583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gvb0907"},"dateCreated":"2003-11-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Adequate Film on Neglected Topic","reviewBody":"Code breaking is hard work. Though picks and shovels aren't required, the hours are long and the frustrations constant. The code breaking process is complex, relying heavily on logic, mathematics, and the assistance of computers. Code breakers themselves often are very weird people who make the common nerd seem comparatively normal. Given all this, it's understandable that hardly any films, aside from documentaries, have been made about the lives and loves of code breakers.

 Until "Enigma", the one exception was "Breaking the Code", the story of Alan Turing, the mathematician perhaps most responsible for cracking the Enigma. But Turing's story, though psychologically fascinating, has its limitations for conventional film makers, the most obvious being the difficulty in creating dramatic tension and the absence of any female love interest.

 Michael Apted's `Enigma' is the first real attempt to tell the story of the Bletchley Park code breakers within the framework of both a thriller and a heterosexual romance. As might be expected given the historical circumstances, the thriller aspects come off as rather subdued and the romance, such as it is, as rather restrained.

 Set in the dreary England of 1943, where stiff upper lips were bearing the weight of four years of war, `Enigma' centers on mathematician Tom Jericho (Dougray Scott). His day and night job is code cracking, but Jericho spends much of the film attempting to solve the mystery of the disappearance of his former lover, Claire Romilly (Saffron Burrows). Jericho is assisted by the suitably frumpy Hester Wallace (Kate Winslet), but harassed by an elegant MI-5 officer named Wigram (Jermey Northam), who suspects him of both murder and treason.

 The disheveled Mr. Jericho and the dowdy Miss Wallace spend much of the film on a last-name basis as they poke through files and try to decode intercepts Claire had in her possession. This leads them off into what seems a blind alley but eventually turns out to be the key to much of the mystery. In the midst of all this, Tom manages to tear himself away long enough to return to work, make a breakthrough, and help his mates recover the keys to a code the Germans had altered, thus changing the course of a critical convoy battle in the North Atlantic.

 Slow paced and sometimes dense, `Enigma' is enlivened by Northam's portrayal of Wigram, who has a habit of turning up at inopportune moments and making matters difficult for Jericho. Northam has a lot of fun with this role and he looks great in his suits, providing a sharp sartorial contrast to the drab Jericho-Wallace line of wartime apparel.

 Although some critics have compared `Enigma' favorably to works of Hitchcock, Hitch's touch was always lighter and his pacing livelier. And Dougray Scott is not Cary Grant any more than Kate Winslett is Grace Kelly, which is all well and good as this dark, serious film clearly benefits from the use of less glamorous performers.

 Historically `Enigma' is reasonably accurate, though only so far as it goes. Alan Turing isn't even given a cameo and the original Polish contribution to the code breaking is barely acknowledged. Unfortunately, the film was not shot at Bletchley Park, some of which still survives, but at various other sites in England and Holland.

 Recommended to those interested in code breaking and in World War Two. Others probably will find "Enigma" just that."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20731,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-09-28","keywords":"code breaking,traitor,world war two,bletchley park,spy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Enigma","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1084555545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRjYTdmYTYtNWY4ZC00N2FiLWEzZDUtNzk3MTc4ZDE5MGI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRjYTdmYTYtNWY4ZC00N2FiLWEzZDUtNzk3MTc4ZDE5MGI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0779084/","name":"Dougray Scott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004787/","name":"Saffron Burrows"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000776/","name":"Michael Apted"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076402/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057092/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365249/","name":"Robert Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001779/","name":"Tom Stoppard"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Beowulf
Beovulf
programme.desc: Beowulf: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Robin Wright, Anthony Hopkins, Paul Baker, John Bilezikjian. The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel, who is terrorizing Denmark, then Grendel's Mother, who begins killing out of revenge." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0442933/","name":"Beowulf","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzMjM0MTc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzU0ODMyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel, who is terrorizing Denmark, then Grendel's Mother, who begins killing out of revenge.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0442933/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kirpianuscus"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"impressive","reviewBody":"The first risk about this version of "Beowulf" is to see it as one of Zemeckis eccentricities. A technique used for a sort of childish game without limits. The second view discovers the purpose of the game - to propose the right essence of poem. The fluidity and dramatism of plot. The bitter flavor of confrontations. And the seed of the victory. Impressive, shocking in few scenes, it is a precise exploration of a world who becomes less familiar. Because, behind shadows and animation, violence and nudity, the message of "Beowulf" becomes more clear. And usefull. And, maybe, this is the most important thing in its case."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":165534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2007-11-28","keywords":"adult animation,beowulf character,king hrothgar character,character name as title,psychotronic film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Beowulf","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3232825625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MzE2NTY2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzUwODg3._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MzE2NTY2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzUwODg3._V1_.jpg","description":"Beowulf - Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935653/","name":"Ray Winstone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000417/","name":"Crispin Glover"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036807/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301274/","name":"Neil Gaiman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000812/","name":"Roger Avary"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1511619/","name":"Anonymous"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Agresioni
programme.desc: Dana Ashbrook, Derek Mears. Një adoleshent me një të kaluar të dhunshme, është mëse i gatshëm të përballet me kriminelët që janë futur në shtëpinë e tij dhe t'iu përgjigjet me të njëjtën mënyrë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kasapi
programme.desc: Eric Roberts, Robert Davi. Pasi i shpëton një kurthi për eliminimin e tij, një gangster fillon të hakmerret kundër të gjithë njerëzve përgjegjës.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Prapa vijës së armikut 2
programme.desc: Matt Bushell, Shane Edelman, Keith David. Disa ushtarë specialë të dërguar në Korenë e Veriut, me një mision për të shkatërruar një reaktor nuklear, duhet të luftojnë për të shpëtuar veten e tyre dhe botën.
programme.category: Boshti i së keqes

programme.title: Siguri maksimale 2
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren. Xhek, ish-bashkëpunëtor i CIA-s, mbikqyr një gurp elitar keqbërësish. Pas një pune arrestohen dhe dërgohen në burgun e sigurisë më të lartë. Për të fituar lirinë, ai duhet të grabisë paratë e burgut dhe të shpëtojë ekipin.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Burrat me të zeza II
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith. Kete here agjenti (Will Smith) dergohet ne ndihme te kolegut te tij, per t'i kthyer atij kujtesen, dhe per te vazhduar luften e tyre kunder alieneve.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Mjeshtri i madh
programme.desc: Një film epik artesh marciale, bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të mjeshtrit legjendar të Kung Fu-së, Ip Man mësuesi dhe frymëzuesi i Bruce Lee. Me Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Cung Le, Hye-kyo Song. Regjisor: Wai Kar Wong.
programme.category: Aksion/ Biografi

programme.title: Hanxhari 2
programme.desc: D.Trejo. Ish agjenti meksikan Hanxhari, rekrutohet nga presidenti i SHBA, për një mision te ri. Ai duhet të përballet me një revolucionar të çmendur dhe një tregtar armësh miliarder, që ka thurur një plan për të përhapur luftën në botë...
programme.category: Aksion

fantazi

programme.title: Metro: Ndermjetesi
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy, Michael Rapaport. Një negociator pengjesh dhe një snajper i 'SWAT', vihen në ndjekje të një grabitësi bankash të pamëshirshëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Plumbi i fundit
programme.desc: D. Lundgren, C. Gooding Jr. Një vrasës punësohet nga një bandë, dikur nën shënjestrën e tij. Por një tjetër vrasës përpiqet të eliminojë atë vetë. Askush nuk është i sigurt dhe plumbi i fundit mund të vendosë se kush do të mbijetojë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Bota e ujit
programme.desc: K.Costner. Ajsbergët polarë kanë shkrirë dhe bota është mbuluar nga uji. Të mbijetuarit lundrojnë në det në përpjekje për të mbijetuar. Një mutant do të dalë nga ekzistenca e tij e vetmuar për të ndihmuar një grua dhe një fëmijë.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Ligji i Hanës
programme.desc: Sara Canning, Kimberly Elise, Billy Zane. Një gjuetare shpërblimesh vihet në kërkim të njerëzve përgjegjës për vrasjen e prindërve të saj.
programme.category: Western

programme.title: Unë jam numri 4
programme.desc: Alex Pettyfer, Dianna Agron. Një adoleshent me aftësi të jashtëzakonshme, gjithmonë në arrati nga njerëz që kërkojnë ta vrasin, shpërngulet në një qytezë me një identitet të ri dhe këtë herë do t'i duhet të përballet përfundimisht me armikun.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: X-men 3: Beteja e fundit
programme.desc: Hugh Jackman. Një antivirus i ri që shndërron mutandët në njerëz është prodhuar. Magneto do të bëjë gjithçka për ta shkatërruar këtë antivirus dhe të marrë në dorë zotërimin e Tokës por do të pengohet nga skuadra e X-men.
programme.category: Aksion
Fantashkencë

programme.title: Anonim
programme.desc: Rhys Ifans, Vanessa Redgrave. Ndërkohë që oborri mbretëror i Elizabes së Parë përfshihet nga intrigat, një aktor i ri William Shakespeare, del në skenë si një shkrimtar i madh. Por a është ai autori i vërtetë i këtyre kryeveprave?
programme.category: Dramë historike

programme.title: Forca e luftëtarit
programme.desc: Nick Nolte, Scott Mechlowicz. Bazuar në një histori të vëretë. Një i panjohur misterioz, inkurajon një atlelet të talentuar që ëndërron të marrë pjesë në lojërat Olimpike, që ta shohë të ardhmen me një tjetër këndvështrim.
programme.category: SportLife

programme.title: 6 Vjet
programme.desc: Ndërsa i afrohen diplomimit, një çift i ri, i bashkuar prej 6 vitesh nga një dashuri idealiste, fillon të përçahet kur mundësi të reja karriere shfaqen papriur.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Dy botët tona
programme.desc: Një stjuardesë cinike me varësi nga alkooli dhe një djalë gjeni pakistanezo - amerikan, krijojnë një miqësi të fortë ndërsa përpiqen të gjejnë babanë e tij, në kaosin e krijuar pas sulmeve të 11 shtatorit 2011.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Deri në fund
programme.desc: Bryan Cranston. Lyndon B. Johnson bëhet Presidenti i Shteteve të Bashkuara pas pasojave kaotike të vrasjes së John. F. Kennedy dhe shpenzon vitin e tij të parë në detyrë për të kaluar sa më shpejt Aktin e të Drejtave Civile.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: All eyez on me:Legjenda e Tupak Shakur
programme.desc: Historia e pathënë e reperit, aktorit, poetit dhe aktivitstit Tupak Shakur, nisur nga ditët e para në Nju Jork, deri në shndërrimin e një prej zërave më me influencë në të gjithë botën, dhe vdekjes së parakohëshme në moshën 25-vjeçare.
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Gruaja e udhëtarit të kohës
programme.desc: Eric Bana, Rachel McAdams. Bazuar në romanin best-seller të Audrey Niffenegger. Kjo është historia e nje njeriu, i cili vuan nga një anomali gjenetike që e bën të udhëtojë në kohë dhe ndërlikimet që kjo sjell në martesën e tij...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Sigurisht, ndoshta
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds, Abigail Breslin. Me kërkesën e së bijës, një baba në prag divorci, i rrëfen asaj tri marrëdhëniet sentimentale më të rëndësishme të jetës. Duke u ndërruar emrat grave, e bija duhet të gjejë se cila prej tyre është nëna e saj.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Meksikani
programme.desc: Regjia: Gore Verbinski. Aktorët: Brad Pit, Julia Roberts, James Gandolfini. Një i ri pranon të transportojë një pisqollë të vjetër, që thuhet se është e mallkuar, ndërkohë që e dashura këmbëngul që ai të braktisë jetën prej krimineli..
programme.category: Romancë
krim

programme.title: Aty ku është zemra
programme.desc: N.Portman, A.Judd. Novalee Nation kujtoi se po largohej për një jetë më të mirë. Kur i dashuri e braktisi shtatzënë, askush s'i mesoi asaj të fshehtën e jetes...iu desh ta mësonte vetë. Marrë nga romani bestseller.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Rekordi
programme.desc: Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të tarjnerit Bob Ladouceur, I cili stërviti skuadrën e futbollit amerikan të një shkolle të mesme , duke e kthyer në një prej ekipeve me më shumë fitore në historine e ketij sporti.
programme.category: Dramë
sport

programme.title: Ithtaria
programme.desc: 2017. Një film nga Maggie Betts. Në fillimin e viteve 1960, gjatë periudhës së Vatikanit II, një vajzë e re në rrugëtimin për t'u bërë murgeshë e ka të vështirë të përballet me besimin, ndryshimet e kishës dhe seksualitetin e saj.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Shmangia
programme.desc: Holli duket se ka gjithçka që mund të dëshirojë një grua: dy fëmijë dashur, punën që ka ëndërruar dhe një bashkëshort në kulmin e karrieres. Por jeta e saj në dukje e përkryer, merr një kthesë të papritur kur pagjumësia, obsesionet dhe paranoja, marrin ko.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Jo pa vajzën time
programme.desc: Sally Field, Alfred Molina. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të Betty Mahmoody. E mbajtur forcërisht në Iran nga bashkëshorti, një grua amerikane bën të pamundurën që të largohet bashkë me vajzën e saj.
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Për një jetë të mirë
programme.desc: Robert Pattinson, Benny Safdie. Një grabitës bankash, i gatshëm të bëjë gjithçka për të nxjerrë nga burgu vëllain e tij më të vogël, e gjen veten në një natë të çmendur, plot adrenalinë e dhunë.
programme.category: Krim

programme.title: Mendje të Pushtuara
programme.desc: Tasya një vrasëse elitare në një organizatë sekrete, duke përdorur teknologjinë më të fundit, merr kontrollin e trupave të njerëzve të tjerë për të ekzekutuar objektivat. Por një ditë ajo bllokohet brenda një mendjeje që kërcënon ta asgjësojë.
programme.category: Horror
fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Kush bën ligjin
programme.desc: Pas një aksidenti me pasojë vdekjen e mikut te tij, Xhejkob Harlon dënohet me burg, ku detyrohet të përshtatet me brutalitetin dhe rregullat e dhuneshme për te siguruar mbijetesën.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Melodi Krishtlindjesh
programme.desc: Pasi largohet nga Manhatani, Kristina dhe vajza e saj Emili e kanë të vështirë të përshtaten në qyetëz e saj të linndjes. Por me ndihmën e një mësuesi muzike dhe pak magjie të festave, ato zbulojnë se shtëpia është aty ku ta ndjen zemra.
programme.category: Komedi
muzikë

programme.title: Vrasje gjakftohtë
programme.desc: Jean Reno. Një vrasës legjender tërhiqet në qetësinë e një shtëpie të izoluar buzë liqenit. Takimi rastësor me një grua dhe sekreti që ajo fsheh, mund ta detyrojnë atë t'u rikthehet mënyrave të tij vdekjeprurëse.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: E di që je këtu
programme.desc: Bella Thorne. 10 vjet pasi një ngjarje apokaliptike e la botën të pushtuar nga shpirtrat, duket se jeta e adoleshentes Roni po i rikthehet normalitetit, por, një mesazh misterioz nga përtej varrit e paralajmëron për një rrezik të madh.
programme.category: Mister
thriller

programme.title: Kthimi i Meri Popins
programme.desc: Emily Blunt, Meryl Streep, Colin Firth. Dekada pas vizitës së saj të parë, dadoja magjike Meri Popins rikthet që të ndihmojë Xhejn dhe Majkëll Benksin, si dhe tre fëmijët e Majkëllit, gjatë një periudhe të vështirë në jetët e tyre...
programme.category: Muzikal
fantazi
komedi

programme.title: Banda ime luan Pop
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Diego Abatantuono. Në vitet 80 grupi më i famshëm në Itali ishte PopKorn. Por më pas ata u ndanë dhe sot s'kanë asnjë kacidhe. Të dëshpëruar, vendosin të ribashkohen dhe ta provojnë përsëri por tashmë si një grup kriminal.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Planeti i Majmunëve: Lufta
programme.desc: Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson. Çezari dhe majmunët e tjerë detyrohen të përfshihen në një konflikt vdekjeprurës me një ushtri njerëzish të drejtuar nga një kolonel i pashpirt. Beteja e tyre epike do të vendosë fatin e secilës racë...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Shoku ynë
programme.desc: Jason Segel, Dakota Johnson, Casey Affleck. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë dhe të jashtëzakonshme. Pas marrjes së një lajmi tronditës, një çift gjen mbështetjen e papritur të shokut të tyre të ngushtë, i cili vendos jetën e tij në pritje dhe zhvendoset.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Toy Story 4
programme.desc: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen. Kur Boni shton një lodër të re artizanale në dhomën e saj, një udhëtim aventurier përkrahë miqëve të vjetër dhe të rinj do t'i tregojë Woody-t sa e madhe mund të jetë bota për një lodër.
programme.category: Animacion
Aventurë
Komedi

programme.title: Poli
programme.desc: Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Seth Rogen. Dy miq, të apasionuar pas fantashkencës, nisen drejt vendeve më të njohura ku janë parë U.F.O. Por pasi njihen me Polin, një jashtëtokësor i vogël e jeshil, ata kuptojnë se gjithçka është e vërtetë...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Pesë më të mirët
programme.desc: Chris Rock, Rosario Dawson. Pas takimit me një gazetare, një komedian i kthyer në yll të kinemasë, detyrohet të përballet me karrierën që e bëri të njohur dhe me jetën që la pas...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ka diçka tek Meri
programme.desc: Cameron Diaz, Ben Stiller, Matt Dillon. Edhe pse takimi i parë ishte një katastrofë dhe kanë kaluar 13 vjet, Tedi ka ende ndjenja për Merin, prandaj ka punësuar një hetues për ta gjetur. Por ai nuk është i vetmi që ndjen diçka për Merin.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Mr. Bean në udhëtim
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Vdekja me fytyrë gruaje
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Goldie Hawn, Bruce Willis. Një aktore dhe një shkrimtare luftojnë pambarimisht për një kirurg plastik dhe për sekretin e bukurisë së përjetshme...
programme.category: Komedi e zezë

programme.title: Burri i shtëpisë
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones. Te mbrosh deshmitaret e vetme te nje vrasjeje, qe rastesia e do qe te jene nxitese tifozash, eshte sfide e vertete. Te jetosh me to eshte mision i pamundur. Roland Sharpin e gjore, e ka zene keq me keto 5 dhelperushe.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Femrat kundër meshkujve
programme.desc: Claudio Bisio, Nancy Brilli, Salvatore Ficarra. Pas suksesit të filmit 'Meshkujt kundër femrave', vjen radha e femrave, për të kërkuar dëshpërimisht burrin ideal... Por a do munden dot?
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Kur të rriten fëmijët
programme.desc: 2019.Patricia Arquette, Felicity Huffman. Tri mikesha të lëna pas dore nga djemtë e tyre të rritur, nisen për Nju Jork për t'u riafruar me ta. Por, kur prindërit ndërhyjnë në jetën e fëmijëve të tyre, nuk mund t'i parashikosh kurrë pasojat...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Hirushja në sfilatë
programme.desc: Portia Doubleday, Marc-André Grondin. Pasi konflikohet me njerkën dhe të bijat e saj, një stiliste e re maskohet dhe përpiqet të shpëtojë biznesin e babait nga falimentimi.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Profesori i marrosur 2
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy. Profesori i marrosur është rikthyer! Kësaj radhe ka zbuluar formulën brilante për të qëndruar 'gjithmonë i ri' dhe ka tërhequr me vete gjithë familjen në aventurat e tij më të reja.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Provimi i pjekurisë
programme.desc: Raoul Bova, Barbora Bobulova, Ambra Angiolini, Luca Bizzarri. Dikur miq të ngushtë, sot gjashtë 30-të vjeçarë, secili në rrugën e tij, do të njoftohen nga Ministria e Arsimit , se duhet të përsërisin edhe njëherë provimin e maturës...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Joshja e madhe
programme.desc: Brendan Gleeson, Taylor Kitsch. Per të mbijetuar, banorëve të një fshati të vogël peshkatarësh i duhet një doktor... Pasi doktori gjendet, i gjithë fshati, bashkë me kryetarin e tyre, do të mobilizohen që të realizojnë 'Joshjen e madhe'.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Të vrasim Ganterin
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger. Kur një grup vrasësish të rinj vendosin të heqin qafe vrasësin më famëkeq në industri, do të kuptojnë në kurriz të tyre se ka një arsye përse ai është më i miri...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vrasësit anonimë
programme.desc: Gary Oldman, Jessica Alba. Atmosfera paqësore e një grupi suporti për vrasësit anonimë, tensionohet kur ata përpiqen të zbulojnë se cili prej tyre është autori i një vrasjeje në tentativë që ka alarmuar policinë.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Vrasje për drejtësi
programme.desc: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino. Dy hetues veteranë të policisë thirren për të zbuluar të vërtetën e një vrasësi, i cili ekzekuton kriminelët që i kanë shpëtuar drejtësisë. Të jetë ky një vrasës i pashpirt, apo një 'hero' që kërkon drejtësi?
programme.category: Krim
mister

programme.title: Verbëria
programme.desc: Julianne Moore, Mark Ruffalo. Një epidemi e tmerrshme, po verbon njerëzit e një qyteti. I vetmi njeri që mund të shohë ende është gruaja e një doktori, e cila po bën të pamundurën për të gjetur një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Mirë se erdhe në të djeshmen
programme.desc: Jonny Weston, Sofia Black-D'Elia. Një grup adoleshentësh zbulojnë planet për një makinë kohe dhe arrijnë ta ndërtojnë. Por shumë shpejt, gjërat fillojnë të dalin jashtë kontrollit.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Parku i Xunkthit
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett, Rose Byrne. Methju kish bërë gjithçka për ta harruar Lizën, që dy vjet të shkuara e kish lënë dhe qe zhdukur pa lënë gjurmë. Një grua...në një nga miliona kafenete e Çikagos. Fantazmë e kohëve të shkuara?
programme.category: Mister
thriller

programme.title: Rreziku në det
programme.desc: Një shkëputje relaksuese bëhet vdekjeprurëse për një ish-Marins, i cili duhet të rrezikojë sërish jetën për të shpëtuar gruan e tij dhe mikun më të mirë, nga një këcënim i papritur në mes te detit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Të harruarit
programme.desc: Julianne Moore. Gjithçka që ju kanë thënë deri tani; çdo kujtim që për ju është i shtrenjtë; çdo emocion që keni përjetuar...s'kanë ndodhur kurrë...s'ekzistojnë. Gjithçka është fryt i imagjinates tuaj...ndoshta tepër krijuese!
programme.category: Thriller
fantazi

programme.title: Telefonata e inspektorit
programme.desc: Një inspektor misterioz mbërrin në pronën e familjes se pasur Birling, pak para se ata të nisin një festë luksoze. Ai sjell lajmin e vetvrasjes së një gruaje të re dhe ka disa pyetje për të gjithë familjarët...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Aureola
programme.desc: Ricardo Darín. Një grabitje e përkryer, e planifikuar me përpikmëri dhe me një arratisje brilante. I vetmi problem: Gjithçka ishte fantazi e Estebanit. Por, një tragjedi e kthen planin në mendjen e tij, në një realitet të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Pakti
programme.desc: 2011. Nicolas Cage, Guy Pearce. Jeta e një njeriu të qetë dhe familjar kthehet përmbys, kur gruaja e tij sulmohet mizorisht. Ai kontaktohet nga një i panjohur, i cili për një 'nder' në të ardhmen, i tregon se mund të eliminojë fajtorin...
programme.category: Mister
thriller

programme.title: Gënjeshtra
programme.desc: 2018. Peter Sarsgaard, Joey King. Kur vajza e tyre adoleshente rrëfen se ka kryer një krim të tmerrshëm, dy prindër të dëshpëruar përpiqen të mbulojnë krimin duke ngritur një rrjet gënjeshtrash dhe mashtrimi.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.title: Aladdin
Aladin
programme.desc:
Aladdin: Directed by Ron Clements, John Musker. With Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin, Jonathan Freeman. A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103639/","name":"Aladdin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Q2NDI1MjUtM2Q5ZS00MTFlLWJiYWEtNTZmNjQ3OGJkZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103639/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ElMaruecan82"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forever a favorite of mine ...","reviewBody":"I will never forget the first time I watched "Aladdin", I was with a group of friends waiting in the airport for the plane that would take us from Orlando to Paris at the time when "Aladdin" was the 'big thing' in the USA while some previews of "The Lion King" were starting to screen. "Aladdin" will forever be associated to that wonderful week I spent in Disneyland, and it's only fitting if the movie is my favorite Disney film, slightly edging-out "The Jungle Book".

I know I can get all rational in this review, analyzing what makes "Aladdin" such an appealing film and using the expected words of 'Disney Renaissance' and a comparison with the glorious Best Picture nominee predecessor. I can also talk about the animation, the music, the extraordinary multi-vocal performance of Robin Williams as Genie but I don't feel like getting rational. I love the film for personal reasons that are essentially due to the excellent timing of this film in its penetration of my pre-adolescent life. "Aladdin" took a forever cherished place as one of the last treasures that enriched my childhood even playing a pivotal role in the way I would start enjoying cartoons.

"Kid's day in the USA!" was the motto of the week that was celebrating the 65th birthday of Mickey Mouse, and for a kid who never traveled outside his country, going to Disneyland was the most unexpected destination, the most extraordinary trip I would never have dared to dream of. This is when I discovered "Aladdin", through the 'Prince Ali' fanfare endlessly performed during the parades, through the films' images aired on TV; something was strangely attracting me to the film. And I guess the fact that I knew the story helped a lot: I grew up with a French cartoon from 1969, titled 'Aladin and the Magic Lamp' recorded in an 80's videocassette, a movie I can recite (and sing) by heart, and there was also an obscure Manga 'Aladdin' film we watched at school before the summer holidays.

Needless to say I was already familiar with the story, and seeing it translated into Disney language was something I was excited to see. Would they talk about Aladdin's deceased father Mustapha? Would he live with his mother? What kind of roles would Genie play? Well one thing matters apart from these questions: I knew the story and I could understand the film even if I didn't speak English at that time it wouldn't have helped me anyway because the airport was very noisy, so I just sat on my luggage, eating some candies, and I could understand who was who and what was everyone's scheme: obviously, Aladdin wanted to be a prince to marry the princess and Jafar to marry the princess to become the prince, and between them, the Genie would come to fulfill their dreams. So, I saw the film and I loved it.

And for one year, before I would see it again, the music of 'Pince Ali' and 'A Whole New World' was the musical remembrance of that magical week in Disney World. And when I saw it again, it took another dimension: I finally understood the subtleties of the stories, I learned all the songs after repetitive viewings, and for months and months, I was transported by the 'Prince Ali' parade and its climactic conclusion and the romantic 'A Whole New World' and its beautiful opening, when Jasmine jumps on the carpet and the zoomed-out Rajah looks smaller and smaller, watching from the balcony. I saw the film so many times during my pre-teen years that I would never forget the first sensations it immersed me into, with an unexpected awkward one.

I must confess that Jasmine was one of my first movie crushes and my idea of the ideal woman as a kid, I don't know why but the way she looked during the 'love at first sight moment' hypnotized me and the moment where I always melt occurs in the carpet ride, when Aladdin gives her the apple, when you understand that she understood who the Prince Ali is, there are no words to describe how incredibly sexy she looks at that very moment. The crush didn't last of course, and as I grew older and was disappointed with the 'Return of Jafar' sequel and the TV series, my interest for "Aladdin" declined and it was reduced to 'kid's stuff I used to like'.

And then 10 years later, as a student, I saw the film again on my computer, eating a pizza, and something magical happened when the 'Whole New World' music started during the closing credits, my heart was inundated by a nostalgic torrent, so immense that I couldn't stop crying because it reminded me of the privileged place the movie occupied once in my heart. The magic was back, and whenever I was spending a good time with friends, we were having fun listening to these old Disney songs, and the clip of 'A Whole New World' was a must-see and how glad I was to discover that I wasn't the only one who 'liked' Jasmine.

I feel so concerned by this film and so deeply attached to it, that I don't want to spoil this review with critical or ecstatic reviews, the film is just thrilling, romantic, adventurous, and features certainly the greatest cast of supporting characters without it being the counterpart of a dull hero or heroine, there's not a single minute of the film that seems pointless and wasted and certainly not with a character like Genie. That's the best I could do to rationally 'explain' my love for "Aladdin".

But maybe because loving a film can also depend on external factors that influence your judgment, in the case of "Aladdin", everything contributed to make this my favorite Disney film ... for sentimental reasons yes, but who ever said they were wrong?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":389662,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1992-11-25","keywords":"genie,three wishes,genie character,arab,princess","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi677035801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQyMjRhYjUtOGM1My00OTQzLWEzZTAtOThjM2Q3OTMyNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQyMjRhYjUtOGM1My00OTQzLWEzZTAtOThjM2Q3OTMyNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0918334/","name":"Scott Weinger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488306/","name":"Linda Larkin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166256/","name":"Ron Clements"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615780/","name":"John Musker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133018/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166256/","name":"Ron Clements"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615780/","name":"John Musker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Britanija
programme.desc: Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Nemilosrdni i lukavi general Aulo Plaucije odlučniji je no ikad da osvoji ovu mitsku zemlju na krajnjem rubu Rimskog Carstva. Sada je slomio i razbio moćne druide, ali njegova prava misija da zarobi i ubije Odabranu ostaje nedostižna. Uz snage koje se okupljaju protiv nje, Cait je ranjivija nego što misli. Skrhana događajima u drugoj sezoni, bori se sa svojim putom Odabrane - no možete li ikada zaista pobjeći od svoje sudbine?

programme.title: Scenes from a Marriage
Prizori iz bračnog života
programme.desc: Scenes from a Marriage: Created by Hagai Levi. With Jessica Chastain, Oscar Isaac, Sophia Kopera, Nicole Beharie. Television drama miniseries which re-examines the original's iconic depiction of love, hatred, desire, monogamy, marriage and divorce through the lens of a contemporary American couple, played by Oscar Isaac and Jessica Chastain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt12682218/","name":"Scenes from a Marriage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY4M2NmMTQtNDNmMy00MGM5LTgxMDMtYWJkOTMxZDI4MWIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Television drama miniseries which re-examines the original's iconic depiction of love, hatred, desire, monogamy, marriage and divorce through the lens of a contemporary American couple, played by Oscar Isaac and Jessica Chastain.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12682218/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"slider9499"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply some of the greatest acting I have ever seen!","reviewBody":"This is what great acting, writing and directing are all about. One of the greatest pieces of acting I have ever seen in my entire life. If these two don't win an Emmy for Best Actress and Actor, then there is no justice in this world.
